scripts.build: npm run build-three && mv dist-three dist
scripts.build-three: mkdir -p dist-three; cp index.html ../multiplatform-common/dist/bundled-models.js src/Models.js src/Views-three.js dist-three
scripts.build-unity: mkdir -p unity-build/fountain; cp src/Models.js unity-build/fountain/; cp src/Views-unity.js unity-build/fountain/Views.js
